title: Fact Check: Woman in this picture is NOT Ajay Devgn’s mother; here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture is doing the rounds on social media in which Bollywood actor Ajay Devgn can be seen sitting next to an aged woman. The post claims that the woman in the picture is Devgn’s mother.

The caption of the picture read: “अपनी #माँ के साथ #अजय #देवगन”

ALSO READ: Did Aamir Khan donate money hidden in wheat bags to poor…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found that the woman in the picture is NOT Ajay Devgn’s mother.

During our investigation, we found that the woman in the above picture is Pushpa Joshi, who starred in one of Devgn’s movies. She made her Bollywood debut at the age of 85 in the 2018 blockbuster titled, ‘Raid’.

We found an article, dated March 25, 2018, by Amar Ujala, which featured the picture in question.

The headline of the article read: “85 की उम्र में ‘अम्मा’ ने बॉलीवुड में की धमाकेदार एंट्री, ‘रेड’ में इलियाना को दे रहीं कड़ी टक्कर”

Joshi was again in the news after she passed away at the age of 86 in November 2019.

Moreover, Ajay Devgn’s mother’s name is Veena Devgan and her picture with Ajay Devgn is attached below.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the claim attached to the picture is FAKE.
